ncrsCollector.abcd:GatheringAgent: Bock, C., on original label: Carl Bock

Moret, print on original label: Büttikofer Borneo-Exp. On label RMNH: coll. Büttikofer
comment recorder: Moret used a Büttikofer Borneo-Exp. label after this expedition had ended. Büttikofer is NOT the collector!
